Log in to your Amtrak.com Account

Forgot password?

Register

Make reservations faster by saving your basic travel-related information in a secure format; you won't have to re-enter mailing and billing address information each time you make a reservation. We'll remember your favorite departure and arrival stations, Amtrak Guest Rewards number and any membership discount numbers you may use. Plus, you can review reservations made while logged in to Amtrak.com; reprint eTickets; and upgrade, change or cancel reservations. You must be at least 16 years old to create a profile. Fields marked * are mandatory.

User Information

User Information
Sample Phone Format

E-mail and Password

E-mail and Password
  • Your password must be at least 8 characters.
  • Must include at least 1 alpha character.
  • Must include at least 1 number or special character.

Billing Address

This address must match the address on your credit card statement.

Billing Address

Mailing Address (US/Canada Only)

If you choose to have your tickets delivered you must complete all the fields in this section.

Mailing Address (US/Canada Only)

Travel Profile (Optional)

Travel Profile (Optional)

Once you've created a user profile, the next time you log in, information you provide in your user profile will be used in the booking process. You can always make changes to this information while booking your reservation, or by making changes to your user profile.
